Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Grease and flour a sturdy baking pan.

Combine flour, sugar, raisins, caraway seeds, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl. Add eggs, buttermilk, and milk to the flour mixture; stir until evenly incorporated. Transfer dough to the prepared pan.
